channel.title: Custom Evolution Sword
channel.description:
Hey guys, this is a model i made quiet some time ago, i remember using a concept picture but i lost it. the idea was i made it an evolution sword, so the higher the tier the more badass is looks and stronger it gets. according to meta poly count is 800 but the wire frame doesn't look as though it is, lol if i remade it now, it could be half or even a quarter of that. the bottom one is simply a recolour, another idea i had in mind. that once it reached max evolution you can enchant it to an element, fire, water, air or earth requiring either magic or rc to do so. (fire is one in picture). tell me what you think. :)
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/ifodx5.png[/img]
